title: MergeCoordinator MVP (Phase 09)
description:
Implement src/cadence/dev/merge_coordinator.py and wire it into DevOrchestrator.
• Monitor an internal merge queue (branch-names, commit‐SHA, task-id).
• Fast-forward merge after pre-merge tests pass; auto-rollback on post-merge failure.
• Persist snapshots: `merge_queued`, `merge_succeeded`, `merge_rollback`.
• Unit tests must stub git calls so CI stays offline.

title: FailureResponder → Orchestrator integration bug-fix
description:
DevOrchestrator._attempt_rollback currently calls FailureResponder with wrong signature and passes TaskRecord on construction.
Fix:
  • ctor → `FailureResponder(self.backlog)`  (drop TaskRecord arg).
  • call → `handle_failure(failed_task=task, stage=src_stage, error=str(ex))`.
  • Add regression test that exercises a failing pytest stage and asserts 2 sub-tasks + parent blocked.

title: Cross-process file-locking for BacklogManager & TaskRecord
description:
Prevent two orchestrators on the same repo from corrupting JSON state.
• Adopt `filelock` (MIT) → `<json>.lock` with 10 s timeout.
• Acquire in `save()` / `load()` in addition to existing RLock.
• Raise FileLockTimeoutError so callers can retry.
• Add multiprocessing test that simulates contention.

title: MetaAgent weekly analytics & drift report (Phase 11)
description:
Expand MetaAgent to emit a JSON report summarising:
  • task throughput, failure rate, mean-time-to-fix
  • phase-table drift (via tools/lint_docs.py)
  • governance flag `policy_drift_pct`
Persist report under `.cadence/meta/YYYY-WW.json`; add unit test that a stub run writes the file.

title: Streamlit Command-Centre - live backlog / merge-queue
description:
Upgrade src/cadence/dev/command_center.py:
• WebSocket or polling every 5 s to reflect backlog changes and merge-queue events.
• Colour-coded status (open, blocked, in-progress, archived).
• Per-task log pane reading TaskRecord history.

title: enable_auto_failures flag - CLI, Streamlit & docs wiring
description:
Surface the Failure-Responder switch everywhere:
• scripts/run_orchestrator.py --auto-failures flag
• Streamlit sidebar toggle (persists in session_state)
• README quick-start section
• CI matrix already covers both modes → remove TODOs.
